entry.summary: jq is the go-to command-line tool to manipulate JSON data. To share data collected through a REST API by email, I regularly have to convert JSON to tables, usually formatted in Excel. jq can help automate the formatting, using the csv formatter (tsv is another option) that produce data easily imported in Excel.
